Tweet Text: Algorithm goes open source at noon Pacific Time
Translated Text: 午太平洋時間開放演算法。

Tweet Text: If you don’t like reality, just ignore it
Translated Text: 如果你不喜欢现实，就忽略它吧。

Tweet Text: Important to establish whether someone actually belongs to an organization or not so as to avoid impersonation
Translated Text: 重要的是要确定某人是否真正属于一个组织，以免受到模仿。

Tweet Text:
Old joke about agnostic technologists building artificial super intelligence to find out if there’s a God.

They finally finish & ask the question.

AI replies: “There is now, mfs!!”
Translated Text:
老笑话说，不可知论的技术人员建造人工智能来找出是否有上帝。

他们终于完成了，问出了这个问题。

人工智能回答说：“现在有了，MFS！！”

Tweet Text: Forgot to mention that accounts you follow directly will also be in For You, since you have explicitly asked for them
Translated Text: 忘了提及，你直接关注的账户也会出现在「为你定制」中，因为你已经明确要求了它们。

Tweet Text:
Of course, you need to have good customer service for money. 

Working on it …
Translated Text: 当然，要拿到钱，你就得提供良好的客户服务。正在努力。

Tweet Text: I’m old enough to remember https://t.co/q7uY7rhEY4

Starting April 15th, only verified accounts will be eligible to be in For You recommendations.

The is the only realistic way to address advanced AI bot swarms taking over. It is otherwise a hopeless losing battle.

Voting in polls will require verification for same reason.
Translated Text: 从4月15日开始，只有经过验证的账户才有资格进入“为您推荐”。这是应对先进的AI机器人群体控制的唯一现实途径。否则，这是一场无望的失败之战。参加投票需要验证，出于同样的原因。
